We had a lovely evening at this restaurant. Situated inside the Catalan History Museum, the restaurant features a rooftop terrace that overlooks the harbor and the city.  The farmhouse tomatoes appetizer was my favorite.  We also enjoyed the grilled vegetables, cannelloni, chicken, and fresh fish and shared everything for our family of four.  it was the perfect amount of food that left us satisfied but not overly full.  Terrific, memorable meal with great atmosphere and views.
